alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rusk County through 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sheldon, or 7 miles southeast of Ladysmith, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sheldon around 625 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
